description: Jack Reacher intervenes on an ambush in Tennessee and uncovers a conspiracy.
title: THE SENTINEL
author: Lee Child and Andrew Child
contributor: by Lee Child and Andrew Child

description: The third book in the Jake Brigance series. A 16-year-old is accused of killing a deputy in Clanton, Miss., in 1990.
title: A TIME FOR MERCY
author: John Grisham

description: A doctor serving in the Navy in Afghanistan goes back to North Carolina where two women change his life.
title: THE RETURN
author: Nicholas Sparks

description: Detective Sean Walsh must solve a case involving three missing women who had access to a home where a man was murdered.
title: THREE WOMEN DISAPPEAR
author: James Patterson and Shan Serafin
contributor: by James Patterson and Shan Serafin

description: Bud Threadgoode returns to his hometown and sets off some life-changing events.
title: THE WONDER BOY OF WHISTLE STOP
author: Fannie Flagg

description: A Faustian bargain comes with a curse that affects the adventure Addie LaRue has across centuries.
title: THE INVISIBLE LIFE OF ADDIE LARUE
author: V.E. Schwab

description: An editor of a publishing house inherits her father’s bookstore and receives letters from an anonymous source.
title: THE NOEL LETTERS
author: Richard Paul Evans

description: An 18-year-old who wants to become a police officer falls in love with a young woman who has an aggressive form of cancer.
title: TRULY, MADLY, DEEPLY
author: Karen Kingsbury

description: In a prequel to “The Pillars of the Earth,” a boatbuilder, a Norman noblewoman and a monk live in England under attack by the Welsh and the Vikings.
title: THE EVENING AND THE MORNING
author: Ken Follett

description: After a divorce, a former Chicago police officer resettles in an Irish village where a boy goes missing.
title: THE SEARCHER
author: Tana French

description: After surviving a plane crash, a death doula travels to Egypt to reconnect with an old flame who is an archaeologist.
title: THE BOOK OF TWO WAYS
author: Jodi Picoult

description: A family vacation in an isolated part of Long Island is thrown into confusion when the home’s owners return claiming New York City is having a blackout.
title: LEAVE THE WORLD BEHIND
author: Rumaan Alam

description: The lives of twin sisters who run away from a Southern Black community at age 16 diverge as one returns and the other takes on a different racial identity but their fates intertwine.
title: THE VANISHING HALF
author: Brit Bennett

description: A failed bank robber holds a group of strangers hostage at an apartment open house.
title: ANXIOUS PEOPLE
author: Fredrik Backman

description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
title: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING
author: Delia Owens
